com.android.car.internal

类 NotificationHelperBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.android.car.internal.NotificationHelperBase

  • public abstract class NotificationHelperBase
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a base class for implementing NotificationHelper in car service builtin.

    This is used as an interface between builtin and updatable car service. Do not change it without compatibility check. Adding a new method is ok.

    • 字段概要
